description: Number of low discrepancy sequences in base 3.
references: Harald Niederreiter, Low-discrepancy and low-dispersion sequences, J. Number Theory 30 (1988), no. 1, 51-70.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Simon Plouffe_
